name: .JDX
summary: Learn about .JDX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open JDX files with JCAMP Viewer (multiplatform), which is an application developed by the Polymer Science Learning Center and the University of Wisconsin-Stevens Point Chemistry Department. The program allows you to view the raw spectral data as a graph.
Since JDX files are saved in plain text, you can also use a text or source code editor to view and edit the raw data. Keep in mind that these editors do not display the data in graph format.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .jdx file in JCAMP Viewer 3.1
images.caption: JDX file open in JCAMP Viewer 3.1
